title: ProviderSchema
description: The schema for the provider side of this interface.

vault_url.title: Vault Url
vault_url.description: The URL of the Vault server to connect to.

mount.title: Mount
mount.description: The KV mount available for the requirer application, respecting the pattern 'charm-<requirer app>-<user provided suffix>'.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: Mapping of unit name and credentials for that unit. Credentials are a juju secret containing a 'role-id' and a 'role-secret-id'.
